description: Mobile techniques used by RCSAndroid, ATT&CK software S0295 v1.1
name: RCSAndroid (S0295)

techniques.comment: RCSAndroid can collect passwords for Wi-Fi networks and online accounts, including Skype, Facebook, Twitter, Google, WhatsApp, Mail, and LinkedIn.
RCSAndroid can use SMS for command and control.
RCSAndroid can collect SMS, MMS, and Gmail messages.
RCSAndroid has the ability to dynamically download and execute new code at runtime.
RCSAndroid can record using the microphone as well as capture photos using the front and back cameras.
